title: How to detox from your smartphone with these apps and gadgets
description: Smartphones are designed to make you compulsively check them. With bright colors, flashing lights, and constant notifications, its hard to spend less time on your phone and disconnect. In this episode of Workflow, Andrew Hawkins shows us a few different ways we can detox from our smartphone.
